name: Gisele Scales "2 Think" CD
description:
Ex-Midnight Oil Electric violinist & vocalist Gisèle Scales describes her sound as colourful, happy, inspiring, electro rock pop. Her brand of genre-defying electric violin dance music will not only move your body, it will also challenge your mind. 

Electric violinist & multi-lingual vocalist Gisèle Scales has been invading indie music circles throughout the US & Japan with her solo debut "2 Think". Having album credits with Midnight Oil, Eurogliders, Jeannie Lewis, and the European No.1 single “Mother Egypt” by Vega, Gisèle has come up with a dance CD that not only demands you boogie your ass off, but also lifts you up to the exciting possibility of a world at peace. Gisèle is now joined on stage by her multi-talented 18 yr old son Oliver on drums.

"Great & original sounds! Big love 4U Gisele"- Serge Gainsbourg 
"Hi Gisele...I really like your music"- Carole Bayer Sager
“Talented!” – Rihanna
"Luv ur music xox"- Australian Idol
"Really great. Energetic stuff. Beautiful sounding violin. Love the anthem. Great message. Can't believe it's just you LOL!" - spank248 on YouTube
"Just had a listen to your music - what a funky clever chickie you are! This time last week I was in Paris. You transported me! Gotan Project meets Catherine Deneuve's vocals in Malcolm McClaren's Paris." - Claudia Chan Shaw ABCTV
“You are a very soulful player, and I hope one day to hear some more of this recording” – Joe Dolce
"You amaze me with your talent and endeavour....I'm loving listening to all that beautiful music you're making!"- Peter Garrett

“Wow! Yoko Ono gets it on with Test Department, Kronos Quartet, Jean Luc Ponty and Paul Oakenfold, and musical cherubs are everywhere!” – Musictrax Japan
